医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究人员获得资金来探索与女退伍军人大脑健康相关的因素来自诺森比亚大学和伦敦帝国理工学院的一个开创性的多学科研究团队获得了一项新颖研究的资助，该研究将探讨与女退伍军人大脑健康相关的生物、心理和社会因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Researchers-receive-funding-to-explore-factors-linked-with-brain-health-in-female-military-veterans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Researchers-receive-funding-to-explore-factors-linked-with-brain-health-in-female-military-veterans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d96d4a71-0a55-4ccd-a041-a0b96af43976 Wed, 08 Nov 2023 08:45:01 -0500 Researchers receive funding to explore factors associated with brain health in female military veterans
俄亥俄州对堕胎进行了投票。明年，另外 11 个州也可能会这样做。当活动人士分析周二俄亥俄州保护堕胎权的投票结果时，杰米·科利已经准备好明年向密苏里州选民提出类似的措施。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Ohio-voted-on-abortion-Next-year-11-more-states-might-too.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Ohio-voted-on-abortion-Next-year-11-more-states-might-too.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9ae30536-4e2c-428e-9f4d-626fe760c8f3 Wed, 08 Nov 2023 08:38:46 -0500 Ohio voted on abortion. Next year, 11 more states might, too.
与单独的 DNA 测序相比，随着时间的推移，将 RNA 测序添加到种系基因检测中能否提高准确性和临床敏感性？ DNA 和 RNA 同步测序可检测遗传性癌症的易感性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Can-adding-RNA-sequencing-to-germline-genic-testing-improve-accuracy-and-clinical-sensitivity-over-time-compared-to- DNA 测序单独.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Can-adding-RNA-sequencing-to-germline-genic-testing-improve-accuracy-and-clinical-sensitivity-over-time-compared-to- DNA 测序-alone.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5e706eba-26b0-4660-ad87-bf4848d81531 Wed, 08 Nov 2023 08:33:00 -0500 Can adding RNA sequencing to germline genetic testing improve accuracy and clinical sensitivity over time compared to DNA sequencing alone?
人工智能驱动的放射治疗彻底改变了亨利·福特西布卢姆菲尔德医院的癌症治疗在亨利·福特西布卢姆菲尔德医院接受某些类型癌症放射治疗的患者是该国首批使用尖端治疗系统的患者之一，该系统提高了准确性和精确性，提高了患者的舒适度，并最大限度地减少了副作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/AI-powered-radiation-therapy-revolutionizes-cancer-treatment-at-Henry-Ford-West-Bloomfield-Hospital.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/AI-powered-radiation-therapy-revolutionizes-cancer-treatment-at-Henry-Ford-West-Bloomfield-Hospital.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3e3e5816-6e77-43be-8483-54bcab0515db Wed, 08 Nov 2023 08:21:28 -0500 AI-powered radiation therapy revolutionizes cancer treatment at Henry Ford West Bloomfield Hospital
逆转生物年龄可以延长寿命并降低痴呆和中风风险三种临床 BA 测量与神经系统疾病风险之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Reversing-biological-age-could-increase-longevity-and-lower-dementia-and-中风-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Reversing-biological-age-could-increase-longevity-and-lower-dementia-and-中风-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=91115d4b-0604-43eb-8b89-0d47b16467c2 Wed, 08 Nov 2023 08:12:00 -0500 Reversing biological age could increase longevity and lower dementia and stroke risk
用于语音解码和改进的神经语音假体的高密度皮层电描记术用于语音解码的高分辨率微皮层电图 (μECoG) 神经记录，以改进语音假肢。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/高密度-皮质电图-for-speech-decoding-and-improved-neural-speech-prostheses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/高密度-皮质电图-for-speech-decoding-and-improved-neural-speech-prostheses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5b1b8ee2-1556-4969-925f-97434ee126ea Wed, 08 Nov 2023 07:39:00 -0500 High-density electrocorticography for speech decoding and improved neural speech prostheses
研究表明年轻男性的体重指数与部位特异性肿瘤之间存在线性关联年轻男性体重指数（BMI）与新发部位特异性肿瘤之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Study-shows-linear-associations- Between-body-mass-index-and-site-specific-tumors-in-young-males.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Study-shows-linear-associations- Between-body-mass-index-and-site-specific-tumors-in-young-males.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a0303ecd-f4c2-4ae9-a1b0-9d45a6266a20 Wed, 08 Nov 2023 06:52:00 -0500 Study shows linear associations between body mass index and site-specific tumors in young males
研究发现饮食和久坐行为会影响肥胖儿童的肥胖身体活动、久坐行为和饮食质量之间的关系https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Diet-and-sedentary-behavior-influence-adiposity-in-obese-children-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Diet-and-sedentary-behavior-influence-adiposity-in-obese-children-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=36764e78-0926-4574-a2cb-20073862caed Wed, 08 Nov 2023 06:17:00 -0500 Diet and sedentary behavior influence adiposity in obese children, study finds
美国将为美国老年人提供艾滋病毒预防药物，以阻止病毒传播一项拟议的联邦政策旨在通过提供免费预防药物来保护美国老年人免于感染艾滋病毒，这是赶上欧洲和非洲大部分地区遏制病毒传播的最新举措。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/US-to-cover-HIV-prevention-drugs-for-older-Americans-to-stem-spread-of-the-virus.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/US-to-cover-HIV-prevention-drugs-for-older-Americans-to-stem-spread-of-the-virus.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6d99d1d5-47aa-4daa-9b7e-1d080ea787e0 Wed, 08 Nov 2023 05:44:45 -0500 US to cover HIV prevention drugs for older Americans to stem spread of the virus
创新的人工智能模型利用 YouTube 视频博客及早识别抑郁症迹象一种创新的抑郁症检测模型，利用 YouTube 视频博客的视听功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Innovative-AI-model-uses-YouTube-vlogs-to-identify-depression-signs-early.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Innovative-AI-model-uses-YouTube-vlogs-to-identify-depression-signs-early.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=24c61e5b-50ef-4429-b538-96bcf3c9993f Wed, 08 Nov 2023 05:43:00 -0500 Innovative AI model uses YouTube vlogs to identify depression signs early
